org.apache.flex.swf.types

Class Styles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.types.Styles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICharacterReferrer, IDataType

    public class Styles
extends Object
implements IDataType, ICharacterReferrer
    Styles is a composition of LineStyleArray and FillStyleArray. This is not a type in SWF specification. It is a wrapper class shared by ShapeWithStyle and StyleChangeRecord.
